message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'm looking for a better deal, Alice. Can we do better than that?
Not bad, but I was hoping for a better deal. I'm willing to walk away if it's not more favorable.
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. This is a fair split.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Can you meet me halfway?
I'm not sure I'm willing to give up that much more, Bob. I'll think about it, but I'm not ready to accept yet.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, Bob. This is my best offer so far.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I need a bigger share to make this worth my while. Last chance to make a deal!
Alright, Bob. I'll take this deal. I'm tired of negotiating.
